fields.comment: If enabled, kills this component if it's outside the camera distance
fields.name: enabled

fields.comment: Distance in pixels from the center of camera, if outside this distance the entity is destroyed
fields.name: distance

fields.comment: Offset towards camera in pixels from 'distance' where the entity is respawned if it was frozen
fields.name: distance_border

fields.comment: If more than 'max_count' entities of this type exist the one furthest from camera is destroyed
fields.name: max_count

fields.comment: If true and the entity went too far - this entity will be stored so we can later respawn it where it was destroyed because it got too far from the camera?
fields.name: freeze_on_distance_kill

fields.comment: If true and the entity was one too many of its kind - this entity will be stored so we can later respawn it where it was destroyed because it got too far from the camera?
fields.name: freeze_on_max_count_kill
